item.tcondiadema.sacred_relic.line1: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.
item.tcondiadema.sacred_relic.get: §4An ancient relic suddenly appeared to protect you.
item.csdy.web_13234.name: just for test
item.tcondiadema.neuron_sensors.line1: It may need to be obtained from golems body
modifier.tcondiadema.forma.flavor: add the Polarity of a slot
modifier.tcondiadema.aura_forma.flavor: add the Aura Polarity of a slot
modifier.tcondiadema.fake_kill_aura.desc:
Can only auto-attack once when entity come in...
You may be a victim of pirated killing aura, please download "L2hostility" get the full service
modifier.tcondiadema.avarita.description: All the blocks in your Domain will change to Gold ,Pick up them to get AbsorptionAmount
modifier.tcondiadema.superbia.descriptio: Kill all entities in Domain with a lower max-health than you, and increase your max-health each time.
modifier.tcondiadema.fake_projecte.descr:
Hurt all entities in Domain 1 damage every tick, EMC will not be added
Maybe in your world chemistry has triumphed over alchemy, download the "ProjectE" to turn things around
modifier.tcondiadema.projecte.descriptio: Hurt all entities in Domain 1000 damage every tick. And add 1000 EMC
modifier.tcondiadema.wind: No.?-The Thing That Walked on the Wind
modifier.tcondiadema.wind.flavor: Deathwalker ...... Wind God, you walk in the wind...... adoramus te...... adoramus te...... adoramus te......
modifier.tcondiadema.wind.description: Increases evasion chance by 80%, gains gamemode crative flight and quadruple movement/flight speed, and other entities in Domain Armor return to 0
modifier.tcondiadema.abyss.flavor: I threw him into a place where there was no top and bottom
modifier.tcondiadema.abyss.description: all entities in Domain Y pos always lower than -500
modifier.tcondiadema.meridia_verse.descr: All entities in Domain will round and round and round
modifier.tcondiadema.fake_meltdown.descr:
ignite all entities in Domain(Real All)
You may be in the Middle Ages when atomic technology was not invented, download "Mekanism" to move the world forward
modifier.tcondiadema.meltdown.flavor: I have a dream where I take you by your hammering neck
modifier.tcondiadema.meltdown.descriptio: Hurt all entities in Domain 2500 LASER damage every tick and radiate them.
modifier.tcondiadema.warden: No.500-The disaster of the ancient city
modifier.tcondiadema.warden.description: Other players in the Domain are plunged into complete darkness and give the mob a Scared effect, and the mob that tries to escape will be attacked with a sonic boom of 30 damage
modifier.tcondiadema.gula.description: The death of other creatures within the Domain will increase your max health and attack damage by 0.8 times that of the deceased creature.
modifier.tcondiadema.luxuria.description: All non-player creatures within the Domain will have their held items replaced with End Rods. The health of all creatures will gradually weaken and be converted into Milk Buckets and Experience Orbs.
modifier.tcondiadema.fake_shinratensei.d:
All creatures within the domain will be slowed.  
You may not have awakened the Rinnegan yet. Download "Cycle" to obtain the power of the Six Paths Sage.
modifier.tcondiadema.shinratensei.descri: Repel all entities within the Domain.
modifier.tcondiadema.time_rain.descripti: Time Rain erodes the lives and clothing of creatures in the Domain.When fully exposed to the rain, it is the death period
modifier.tcondiadema.pheromone_mist.desc: Let the animals in the Domain keep reproducing.
modifier.tcondiadema.love_train.flavor: I have already picked up the original napkin.
modifier.tcondiadema.love_train.descript: When a creature within the Domain takes damage, it is transferred to any other creature outside the Domain in the world
love_train_text1: You transferred the misfortune you suffered to
modifier.tcondiadema.apollyon.flavor: Summons 12 Apostle Servant with you as their leader every 66 seconds
modifier.tcondiadema.apollyon.descriptio:
Behold: you stood at the door and knocked, and it was opened to you.
I come from the end, and I am here to stay for but a moment.
At the same time, I am the one who kindled the light to face the world.
My loved ones, who now eagerly desire the greater gifts; I will show you the most excellent way.
My loved ones, do not worry; I have heard your prayers.
Have you not yet realized that pain is but a speck to a determined mind?
You pray unto me to prove my miracles.
That you may believe in me, and that by believing you may have life in my name; I shall show you the power.
modifier.tcondiadema.fake_apollyon.descr:
Periodically grants you a pile of feces
You might be in the wrong place - download 'Goety: Revelation' to hear the gospel of the Lord.
modifier.tcondiadema.martyr.flavor:
If the world hate you, ye know that it hated me before it hated you.
(John 15:18)
modifier.tcondiadema.martyr.description: Redirect all damage in the world onto yourself.
modifier.tcondiadema.wonder_of_u.flavor: All you need to do to live peacefully and happily is stop pursuing me. Can't you even manage that little thing?
modifier.tcondiadema.wonder_of_u.descrip: All creatures that hate you and players aiming their cursor at you will suffer calamitous attacks
effect.tcondiadema.wind: The Thing That Walked on the Wind
diadema_message: Search for 'No.' in JEI to view Domain contents
apollyon_join_world: Think not that I came to send peace on the earth: I came not to send peace, but a sword.
apollyon_message_7: A measure of wheat for a penny, and three measures of barley for a penny; and see thou hurt not the oil and the wine.
apollyon_message_4: there fell a great star from heaven, burning as it were a lamp, and it fell upon the third part of the rivers
apollyon_message_2: And they had tails like unto scorpions, and there were stings in their tails: and their power was to hurt men five months.
apollyon_message_9: And he opened his mouth in blasphemy against God, to blaspheme his name, and his tabernacle, and them that dwell in heaven.
apollyon_message_3: Stretch out thine hand toward heaven, that there may be darkness over the land of Egypt, even darkness which may be felt.
apollyon_message_6: Lord, wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven, and consume them, even as Elias did?
apollyon_message_10: And the sight of the glory of the LORD was like devouring fire on the top of the mount in the eyes of the children of Israel.
apollyon_message_5: Thou art the Christ, the Son of the living God.
apollyon_message_1: And the LORD said unto him, Therefore whosoever slayeth Cain, vengeance shall be taken on him sevenfold.
apollyon_message_8: And there fell upon men a great hail out of heaven, every stone about the weight of a talent
apollyon_message_11: And the devil that deceived them was cast into the lake of fire and brimstone, where the beast and the false prophet are
apollyon_message_0: Lord, how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us, and not unto the world?
apollyon_message_12: O Lord God Almighty, which art, and wast, and art to come; because thou hast taken to thee thy great power, and hast reigned.
apollyon_message_13: For the great day of his wrath is come; and who shall be able to stand?
